title: Baptist Girls College
text: Baptist Girl College, often abbreviated as BGC, is an <a href="Single-sex%20education">all-girls</a> <a href="secondary%20school">secondary school</a> at Idi Aba neighbourhood of <a href="Abeokuta">Abeokuta</a>, <a href="Ogun%20State">Ogun State</a>, Nigeria. The school was founded about 100 years ago. BGC was among the mission schools taken over by the <a href="Nigerian%20military%20juntas%20of%201966%E2%80%9379%20and%201983%E2%80%9398">military government</a> after the <a href="Nigerian%20Civil%20War">civil war</a> in the 1970s.
